pages.title: Item Bowls
pages.text: There's always something you forget when leaving the base - maybe placing it in this decorative Item Bowl will serve as a good reminder.$()$(br2)It comes in both a $(item)Basalt$() and $(item)Calcite$() variant.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Item Bowl presents a single item stack floating above it.$(br)Click an item into the Bowl or throw it on top to put it in.
